content.detailedDescription: Around 6:00 am.  out for a walk.  it was still dark.  stopped, was looking up at stars - observing orion.  suddenly saw four orange-ish lights moving very quickly across the sky in a straight line.  based on motion relative to orion, direction of movement was roughly north to south.  thought was an aircraft.  then realized there was no sound - completely silent.  also, were moving way to fast to be an airplane.  then the two on the right moved off toward the right at slightly different rates.  appeared to be four separate objects. were out of sight quickly.  about five seconds start to finish.
content.summary: 4 orange-ish lights; moving very fast/straight; thought was plane, but no sound.  then 2 moved off to the right slightly

content.detailedDescription:
Quincy, ca

noticed an object not making a sound or moving fast at all more like a worm just moving extremely slow in the sky. while filming officers driving to the airport to investigate i captured a ufo within and under one second in the beginning of the video attached.
content.summary: One worm like metal thing that could bend and then a ufo captured in video

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i had just had an argument and retreated to our neutral corners (he on our back balcony and i in the bedroom) when all of a sudden he started shouting for me to come out and look at something in the sky just above our apartment building (we live on the 2nd level of a two story bldg).

once i rushed out on the balcony, we observed three orbs of light in a triangular shape move sideways across the sky. he asked me what i thought it was, and i immediately asked him what he thought it was, in which, he response was, "you know what it is." 

i stood on the balcony looking up at these three orbs crossing the sky kind of side ways and trying to rule out an airplane, helicopter, and such. well we live in direct path of descending planes so i knew that wasn't it and we're high enough to distinguish helicopters, so that wasn't it either.

just as i had almost given up on trying to figure out what they were, the lights stopped in mid-air still maintaining a triangular shape, hovered for a few minutes, then one of the lights moved and started like dancing around one of the other orbs of light. this movable orb of light did not blink but moved lightening fast dancing around one orb, so close that it looked like it had become one light. 

then the dancing orb moved quickly back into position while the shape just hovered over our building, then quietly shimmered away in mid-air. these orbs of light didn't move off or anything. it just stood still and shimmered away.

i was completely in shock & awe. my boyfriend tried to take video of this incident, but we couldn't get all of the orbs of light in one frame.

although i have told a few people of what i saw, and with them looking at me like i was crazy, i have held on to this story (i do not take drugs or drink alcohol). however, with the increase of ufo tv shows coming on, i decided to tell my story on the day i saw a ufo.

i know what i saw!
content.summary: Orbs of light traveling, then hovering, then shimmering away

content.detailedDescription:
These images are to  far away to be seen by my cam but they are not birds?

look maybe like drones?They just hovered,never seen them move, then they were gone. in the image dscf0880.Jpg clearly shows birds ,,,,,same area,dif time
content.summary: Appeers as birds from a distance

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard with a friend watching a green light that appeared to be an airplane flying at normal cruising altitude in the ne sky. suddenly a fiery tail appeared that looked like an engine fire. 

(i was feeling very disturbed at this point as i thought i was witnessing an airplane crash.)

the object continued "on fire" at speed along a straight se trajectory.

(i quickly called my wife to come outside and we watched together.)

after about 2 minutes, 3 objects split off from the original and started to curve down and away from the original object. these 3 objects all had fiery tails and looked the same as the original object and traveled at approximately the same speed.

(at this point i started feeling nauseous with the thought of people dying in the airplane. the sight reminded me of the space shuttle that blew up on takeoff when the booster rockets shot off on their own.)

these 3 objects spiraled downward slowly around each other for several more minutes. they changed directions several times as they weaved around and down. the 3 objects intermittently lost their fiery tail and appeared as green lights. they seemed to be interacting with each other in a sense that as one would move in a direction, the others stayed near (see video).

(at this time i knew it wasn't an airplane based on the flight pattern of these objects, and my thoughts changed to confusion.)

we watched them spiral downward until the sight line was blocked. the original object continued on its original trajectory and also had an intermittent fiery tail. i followed the original object until it was to dim to see.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Single green light with fiery trail at times. split into several similar objects with same characteristics.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright light at 3.30 am which followed me home.
content.summary: Big bright light turning into 2 objects peforming strange manoeuvres

content.detailedDescription:
I want to submit this photo for review. i was taking a picture of what to me seemed to look like an angel form in the clouds.
when going through my camera after getting home i noticed that in one of the two pictures that where taken seconds apart had an object that was not visible in the clouds at the time of me taking the pictures.
content.summary: Appeared in one sequential photo of clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was on board of a old merchant ship as second mate on duty. it was a moonles cloudy night, observed some red and yellow lights on my starboard side. checked for a collision course,with a compass sight, radar was not working, and confirmed it was approaching in collision course. maneuvered the ship to starboard, as colregs specify, to clear what i supposed a vessel, but after several minutes i confirmed it was still in collision course with my ship, that meant it was turning to port side against me. i kept coming to starboard with the same results. when it was too close on mi starboard bow, less than 2 miles approximately, disengaged the autopilot, and went to the rudder wheel, and made a hard port turn, since my vessel was a very good maneuvering ship, and cleared by my starboard side the object. i ordered to my steerman on the bridge, to take the binoculars, to check what type of ship it was. he told me moments later that he only saw a black mass with red and yellow lights. i put the wheel on autopilot again, took another binoculars and saw the same thing. when it was on my side it made no noise at all, no engine sounds, no water sound as a ship sailing. it seem to be floating over the water very close to the surface. weather condition were good, almost no wind, cloudy and mild temperature, sea state very good.My steerman was very frightened whe he saw the object close to the vessel. the object passed to my stern very fast, moving away, and its lights fade away minutes after passing. at that time there were no cell phones with cameras or digital cameras.
content.summary: Black shape, as half black dome with red and yellow lights

content.detailedDescription: Sitting at stop light at intersection of 776 and us 41 in venice, fl. noticed extremely large rectangular shaped object  almost directly overhead with green lights surrounding the entire craft. it was a ufo without a doubt.It hovered for about 1 to 2 mins before a quick exit toward the north. i along with my passenger just stared at the object and said 'do you see that?'. we observed it for about a minute, then it quickly disappeared to the north without any notice, noise or sound. i was stunned. the lights reminded me of a green neon sign that i saw in a business window that could have been for o' douls beer. it disappeared instantaneously.
content.summary: Very large rectangular shape hovered above us 41 at light. for a minute or two

content.detailedDescription: We were in dallas going to the medical center. we stopped to ask for directions as i decided to take a picture of the sign to log into my ablum.I snapped the picture and put my cell phone away. later that night i went to view the pictures i'd taken that day when i noticed on that particular shot a face peering at me. i was shocked because there was nothing on the lawn when i snapped the picture, it scared me when i saw the facial features. i took the picture to my family to show them and we all saw the face in the corner of the picture. we were all amazed and thoughts began to run through our heads. needless to say i did not sleep that night, fearful of whatelse i might see in the dark. i am still wondering how and why it seemed to be right at the car window looking at me. i have since viewed another face on this picture also, just above the apparitions head.
content.summary: Apparition appeared in photo when viewed on cell phone

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i saw a large triangle with v patern lights much to large to be an airplane. just a quick fly over before disappearing behind clouds, without coming out the other end of the cloud. it was above cloud level and still as long as my thumb from any corner to another.
content.summary: Large triangle flew over us at high altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
It was just after 7:00 pm, and i was putting my kids to bed. my mother was coming up the stairs when she first notice the light's. she had everyone come and look. there were 7 rice shaped light's in the sky, hovering over the tree line. they looked like they should have been moving, but they remained in the same spot in the sky for the entire time. 

we got my mom's phone to take a picture, but we were unable to get a good shot with that. i got the camera and went outside with my oldest daughter. by the time we got outside, there were three of the lighter rice-shaped objects left in the sky. they made a large triangle, that just hovered above the tree line. 
the fourth object was much brighter and much larger. it was a reddish-orange that appeared to leave a red smoke/fire trail behind it. this one was coming in from the south and heading in the direction of the triangle of lighter ones.

we watched for about 20 minutes, during which time we were able to get a few pictures and one video. 

the larger one went behind the tree line and we were unable to see it anymore. the triangle of lighter ones, just faded a bit and then disappeared.

in all, the light's lasted for approximately 20 minutes in the sky. we were able to zoom in on one of the pictures that i took of the larger one and it was very strange looking. the fire/smoke came off the back in two lines but you can see that the object itself had very angular sharp edges. it looked like it was 6 sided, with the front going to a point facing outward and the back pointing in toward's itself. it also appeared to have a dark circle in the middle.

we are very curious to know what we saw, and any information will be greatly appreciated. thank you
content.summary: Large bright object flying toward triangle of lighter object's - have pictures

content.detailedDescription: On our front porch my brother in law noticed right away we knew it was an un identified object(s) we don't loose sight of it. it's comes back every night and stays in same spot it's amazing but need someone to see it to believe us. please blow up pic attached and please be in touch with us.
content.summary: Flashing lights stationary flames please blow up pic attached.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Oval shape like almost like a plane with out the wings and tail silver like a shiney silver with light flashing could have been the shine from the shine hitting the object. i was laying down looking out the window when i saw the object not moving then it move to the right but then it change its mind i guess and wait left but without turning hard to describe cause am in shock still. and it was moving not fast at fast then boom gone and i don't mean it flew away it disappear like cloak.
content.summary: I was looking to the sky when i saw the oval sliver shape object with small light flashs but not a plane

content.detailedDescription:
While doing my morning 1/2 hr on an exercycle, looking out a large bay window facing 20 degrees (appx) w of s, at appx 5:40, i observed an extremely bright, greenish white round object appx 45 degrees to my right, and due to the top of the window from which i was looking occluding vision above 20 to 30 degrees above the horizon, i was able to see the object for appx 1 second before it
disappeared over the wooded horizon, which was appx 1 mile distant.

i do the exercycle in the dark, so i can better see out the large (8' w) bay window to observe nature.

i have no idea what the object was, only that it seemed to keep the same trajectory, size, and brightness during the very brief period i was able to observe it, and i wondered at its size, but realized that its size would depend on how far away it was  --  if it were 2 miles away, it would have been perhaps 100' in diameter, but if it were 200 miles distant, it would of necessity been significantly larger, for it to have appeared so plainly to me.

i was concerned, being unable to accurately determine the size or speed of the object, and unable to determine if the object was orbital or would contact the earth  --  i never heard or felt anything, but the actions of the object were such that if it were to contact the earth within 10 miles, it would have
made a sound or shook the earth, so it is likely that the object was either orbital, or that it hit the earth far enough away so i would not have heard anything.

due to the proliferation of cameras, (traffic, security, etc) i would think that it should not be difficult to find a record of it on s facing cameras in the knoxville area.

the intensity and speed of the object did not change, nor were there contrails, sparks, or other
indicators of its passing.

i can think of no way the appearance could have been fabricated in order to perpetrate a prank.

i am 82, retired, and reasonably active with no significant health issues, and have never before observed such an event.
content.summary: Bright disc traveling n to s, disappeared over horizon

content.detailedDescription:
1. in my room and shutting the curtains before going to bed.
2. i was saw more than 4 lights which i thought was odd for an airplane, so i kept staring at it.
3. an airplane, until i waited to see if it was moving.
4. 4-6 lights clustered together, quite bright, over a period of 5 minutes, all but two lights disappeared, like they went out. those two lights kept staying there. when i zoomed in with the digital zoom on my camera, i could see two tiny faint lights below it. they changed between a yellow-orange tinted white and a pink and green. 
5. not particularly surprised considering the sightings i've read about recently within the area. small headache.
6. i didn't, i'm still looking at it. but i need to sleep.
content.summary: Hovering lights changing colours and disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
Batavia road & williams road at 1:30am.  very dark, no background lighting. while scanning the sky, a light "flare" caught my eye in the ne. 
there i saw 3 objects in ne sky in triangle formation, two lights on top and one on bottom. the bottom light was the light that "flared" and caught my eye. then the top right light shot off to the west and just disappeared, the other two lights continued on to the ne in perfect formation until they disappeared. note that there were no clouds in the sky. the top left object was dimmer in light than the bottom light "flared" that it was following. the two lights moved across the sky like the speed of a satellite until they both could no longer be seen. i stepped behind a tree to see just how fast they were moving, and the 2 objects quickly came out from behind the tree. i then stuck my thumb out to get a distance between the two objects and they were a thumbs distance away from each other the whole time while traveling to ne. all three objects were white in color. no flashing, blinking or strobe and no sound.  

my question is, is there any way to look up radar at this time? 

my reaction to seeing this was just to concentrate on what i was seeing and take note best i could. i knew it could not be a satellite, because one was following right behind the other, never braking formation and one shot off to the west. 

strangely, my spouse saw objects last night while coming home from work over fermi lab that can not be explained, said that it looked like a airplane crashing out of the sky.
content.summary: 3 lights in triangle top right light shot to w, top right & bottom formation to ne

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in front. of my window on my seventh floor apartment staring out the window when i noticed something blinking/pulsating a first i didn't know what to think was like nothing i seen before so i started looking around the night sky and i saw another one of these i'm going to refer to it as an orb of lights yellow n orange in color when i noticed towas a second one one far in the east n one far in the south they also seemed to b on the exact same allititude they started maki signal pulsing the light n then amazingly the started moving towards each other at first it seemed they were moving slow because of the distance at first when they started getting closer u could tell they were moving at tremendous speeds none like i've ever seen as the two orbs got close the flew in together and became one in a split sec the orbs produces circular flash and it instantly grew to ten times the size of our sun in the days sky and dissingrated just as fast defiantly second most amazing thing i've witness in my life to n i fortunately had a witness with me he saw it as well r story's match up exactly except the the colour of the massive sun orb other then that its concreat evidence iigsseen something that use humans can't exsplain
content.summary: One was high  in the eastern hemisphere when i noticed there was one identical in the western hemisphere as they had to have been hundreds? of miles apart

content.detailedDescription: While looking for the andromeda galaxy (m31) i noticed a meteor very close to my point of vision which immediately drew my attention.  the meteor was quick and glowed to approximately -3.5 magnitude.  as my eyes turned towards the meteor, i was able to see the final moment of the meteor as the glow died out.  almost immediately i noticed a dim object which seemed to just appear suddenly along the path the meteor took.  at this point the object was slightly north of due east and approximately midway between the horizon and my zenith.  the object began moving westward for about four seconds until it was almost straight up from me.  at this point, the object abruptly changed direction to due north and seemed to move three times as fast as it was previously moving.  when it moved north, it left what appeared to be a vapor trail as it moved north.  when the object made its northward direction change, it was approximately 10 degrees north of my zenith point.  it quickly moved north for a count of "one" when it began a turn towards the west which it maintained until it was heading due south.  the distance between the line along the northward movement and the southbound travel was approximately one degree.  i continued to follow the object until an apple tree behind me blocked my view of the object at which time i moved to an area with a unobstructed, but light polluted southern view.  i was unable to reacquire the object at that time.  the object itself appeared to be about two thirds the size of an aspirin when held at arm's length.  it was circular in shape and appeared to be separated into four section.  i could easily make out the dark area of the circle with a cross in the center with the arms of the cross extending to the outer circle.  both the circle and cross were the same dark color.  however, the areas between the arms of the cross appeared to glow a dull burnt orange color.  there was no deviation of the orange-like color in the four wedges.  the best comparable description of the object is it looked like one of those simon games where the yellow areas of the game were the dark color and the colored buttons of the game the burnt orange color.  i did not hear any sound coming from the object (when it first appeared, i was wearing earphones listening to music.  moments before it made its abrupt northward turn, i removed the ear buds).
content.summary: Object moved from east westward then abruptly north when it turn south and continued out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking, on my way home, from my friends house at approximately 1:15 am on september 21, 2014. it was a dark sky with light cloud coverage a ball of light was apparent.  it did not have the shape of the northern lights.  i though the object was a meteor but it never picked up speed. i decided to snap a few pictures on my phone to research later. the object was a little difficult to estimate due to the distance but i believe it was possible the size of a care tire.  it came toward my direction slowly appeared to hoover then adjust course and left gracefully with in 10 seconds. i was worried because i wasn't sure what it was and it was coming within my vicinity. i watched the object leave.
content.summary: Looked up and the ball of light seem to come closer within 30 seconds adjusted course and left disappearing in 10 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my 6 month old puppy out before going to bed.

the sky is as clear as i have ever scene before. the stars were amazingly bright.
i looked over in the distance and saw the light very far a way. at first i thought it was an airplane landing at the zionsville airport. then i noticed that it was not moving.  so i thought it might be an air craft like a helicopter. as i watch the colors they did not look like an aircraft. the object was hovering but a bit jittery. i grab a pair of binoculars  and observed the object. the lights pulsated making green, white, red, and blue colors.   i don't think it could be a satellite because it was not moving. 

i guess i could be mistaken but every other star was white. then this "star" was pulsating with lights.
content.summary: Looked like a star but it was pulsating with green, red, blue, & white lights

content.detailedDescription: I was working, i was in a car when i noticed a light above the forest that shouldn't be there. it looked something like a street light, but it was a bit bigger and way above the actual street lights of the street i was facing. i stopped the car to have a better look. i saw an orange/yellow light that had reflections of other colours like blue/green. it was definitely not a normal type of light with those reflections. it was hovering, going slowing toward east, it disappeared for some seconds giving the feeling it was loosing intensity, then it appeared again just as before. i was completely amazed. it then started to gown down and i lost sight of it when it went lower than the treetop. i tried to record it with my cellphone but it didn't work, i was too excited and it was too dark for the quality of my camera. i stayed there for a few minutes waiting to see it again, but it didn't come back.
content.summary: Multicolor glowing fireball over forest, hovered over the treetop going very slowy east, disappeared. appeared again, then descended lower than the trees and i lost sight.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother dan hopkins was driving on morning when he noticed a sphere in the sky.  something was different; it almost looked like the moon but not quite.  he started to take pictures after pulling over to the side of the road.  he was in his car for the first photos and then got outside as the event started to unfold.  
eventually he saw at least 3 sphere's.  1 he thought looked like it exploded.  the pictures were taken on his cell phone, and are on his phone in order of the event.  the orbs eventually became more like spaceship shapes.

my brother is still shaken from the event, and shared the pictures with me.  i was also taken back.  i had him send me some of the photos and shared them with a friend who is into watching the stars, etc.  

my brother asked me to provide you with the information and he is open to discussing this further.
content.summary: My brother noticed 1 sphere first, and started taking pictures of the event.

content.detailedDescription: Hugh pulsating very bright object flew over vegas at 7:25  9/23/2014. had to be in a low orbit.  did anyone else see it.    [email removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Hugh pulsating object flew over vegas.

content.detailedDescription:
I was digging through some photos on my phone when i came across this picture. a friend had texted it to me mins. after he had taken it. 
he was by the pick n save on miller park way and lincoln ave. looking south at a storm cloud. he witnessed this with his fianc. 
if you look at the picture, right above the large dark cloud you'll see 3 lights in a triangle formation. he saw this with his own eyes and then took the pic to send me. (didn't take the pic and then realize that the ufo was there)
i know this friend very well and he's not the kind of person to make this up. i know this because he and i have seen a few ufos in our day and are always looking up in our area of milwaukee.
content.summary: Photo of 3 lights or transparent triangle ufo in clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I decided to go for a walk at 10:30 pm around august 12, 1961. it was a clear night, not a single cloud. i was on my second lap around the ballfield when the entire ballfield lite up like a christmas tree. i tilted my head to see what it was.  the object hovered over for about 30-45 seconds. it was about 40-50 feet above me. i noticed the object to be round in shape with one major beam shooting out of the bottom of the aircraft. the beam was so bright it blinded me for a couple of seconds. after studying the aircraft my eyes were focused to the west.  looking out over the trees i noticed there were three more aircaft waiting for the one above me to leave. these three ships all had red lights on the tops of their aircrafts. moments later when the object above decided to leave, the other three left with the other one. these four objects left with such an incredible speed. they were out of sight before i could even blink an eye.
the only noise the object made when it left was a very slight hum. you could barely hear it. the other three made absolutely no noise at all. incredible speeds, i had never witnessed anything like that before. there was nobody else in the ballfield at that time. the spaceship made the area so bright i figured it would be on the news or even in the newspaper.  no such luck. nothing. why was i the only one to see this object? why was it hovering so close to me? why wasn't i abducted? i have thought about that night for the past 53 years. what did they want? i think quite often about the speed that they all traveled and how quiet they all were blew my mind. i wasn't scared at all, just very curious. 53 years later the only thing that has changed is my curiousity.  it's about ten times greater now. it was truly an amazing evening.  thank you & god bless.
content.summary: Walinkg in the baseball park at 10:30 at night when all of a sudden the whole ballfield lite up like it was noontime

content.detailedDescription: This all happened in june 2013, and it has never left my mind since and has had a big impact on my daily life. i'm on a mission to get to the bottom of this mystery. (this is long & detailed as i want you to know as much as possible, and also about the total impact this has had on me). i had a one-on-one experience with a ufo inside our house! (i say i call it a ufo, as it really was unidentified, it was hovering mid-air and i couldn't identify it). it was a normal evening, 7pm and i was putting my son to bed when i had this outer worldly, remarkable experience with something from another dimension. i'm not sure if it was et related or spirit related, but either way, it has turned my world upside down and inside out! i was reading my little 4yr old boy a bedtime story, we were in his room, he was on my knee as we sat on the bed as per usual.  suddenly i noticed a movement out of the corner of my eye, to the left of me. just about 16 inches/ 40 cms away from me, within arms reach was a hovering golden solid orange/yellow ball trying to catch my attention, i just froze and could not believe what i was seeing! it had just materialized out of nowhere. it was about the size of a tennis ball, i have seen orbs in photos but it was nothing like those, which are quite transparent), this was solid. i studied science & zoology at university so have a very inquisitive mind, so i was taking my opportunity to view it from a science perspective, it was 3 dimensional,and looked like it wanted me to communicate with it, (but during the whole experience my worry was for my son). i kept an eye on it while trying to remain calm as i didn't want to scare my son sitting on my knee. i just continued to tell the story to him and mumbled out words that didn't really make any sense and held the book up close to his face, wondering in my mind if i should ask him to look and see it too, but decided best not to. i could have tried to touch it, and maybe would have if i was alone without my son, i would have spoken to it to see what would happen. it knew i was looking at it, i was scared at the time and still am now. its hard to describe its movement, to me it looked like it was finding it hard to stay in one place, with jaggered kind of hover, (like a hover fly). it did move further around to my left until it was over my sons pillow, about 15cm above it. i held my son tight on my knee, while studying this strange object, and then after a minute it disappeared, either dematerialized or going through the bedroom wall itself! then it was gone. to this day i'm spending hours a day looking for answers. i know about orbs in photos etc, but this was solid? i always thought that there must have been other life out there in the universe somewhere, but i never did think ufos or ets were visiting/ or existing on earth but now i do. since i have personally experienced something from another dimension (whether it be some sort of et, or from the spirit realm, i'm now an avid true 'believer' and i'm now seeking the real truth. the after effects have been hard for me, as of coarse i don't want to sound like a nutter, but i also didn't want to keep this to myself. it took me afew weeks to get enough courage to tell my husband, and my son has nightmares and finds it hard to sleep, (i have not told him any of this, but i had a fear it could be related after i have heard about abductions etc...)at first i thought it was spirit related so visited a spiritual shop, when the woman behind the counter explained to me that some ets can first materialize as orbs and hang around homes), so that has lead me to mufon and writing this as i have seen 2 other strange things, i know this sounds truely absurd so i hate to even write this, but i had seen a light shoot out the carved top of my sons bed, and also a really big white light in the sky at night (12 months ago), near the house, but never seen it since. i feel like i had to explain this to help myself get it off my chest and reach out to others whom may have something similar. now i am constantly looking everywhere for evidence. its nice to have my eyes opened to the real world but at the time i feel abit frightened about whats really happening and now my faith in science, (which doesn't beleive in any of these matters), has been dislodged and shaken to the core!
content.summary: I had a personal experience with a solid gold orb in my sons bedroom. it was trying to communicate with me.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside taking pictures on my camera of several (8-10) parallel chemtrails.  when i saw a moving jet begin to emit a chemtrail, i began filming it across the sky. i didn't notice anything until i uploaded the film onto my computer.  about 30 seconds into the film, i saw a ball of light seemingly come away from the jet on the north east side, slightly change angles, then shoot up out of range of my camera. it is easy to miss...Hard to see but i thought with your technology, you might want to take a look at it.
content.summary: Ball of light; orb

content.detailedDescription: The even took place in my village (lydbrook, gloucestershire) where i was sat with two of my friends. we was taking a video of some homeless guy that started to talk to us. i did not notice the flying object until today (23/09/14) when i watched the video back. i noticed something fly by in the background that went so fast if you blinked you would miss it. i slowed the video down as at first i thought it may be a bird. only to find when i zoomed the flying object was triangular shaped with a black centre, moving way to fast to be a bird. also there was no planes/helicopters or birds in the sky at that time, or no noise. when i noticed the shape i felt shocked as this is my first sighting captured of a unidentified flying object.
content.summary: Object flew past really fast in the background of a video i took

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were sitting on a local beach from around 9:15pm.  it was quite dark but we could still see the greyish rain clouds above.  there was also the occasional opening in the clouds, letting us see a few stars.  

as we were looking northwest, directly above us, in a pocket of no cloud, a triangle shape appeared, with 4 lights down each side.  it looked as if it was transparent or completely black.  it made no sound and moved very smoothly within the 7 second time frame we witnessed it.  before disappearing into the clouds, it made a sudden turn south - an on a dime type of turn.  

the event left my wife and i with a euphoric feeling and one we will never forget.  

our location is an apparent hotbed for ufo activity and we've seen some strange lights before, but nothing like this.  

this was an actual triangular shaped craft that seemed as if it knew we were watching the skies and decided to show themselves while still remaining hidden in the cloud cover.
content.summary: Witnessed a triangular craft while sitting on the beach
